snippet.title: Timberborn Update 6 - Wonders of Water is live!
snippet.description:
🌊 Timberborn Update 6 - Wonders of Water is now live! This update features 3D water physics with new hydroengineering tools, expanded verticality, end-game wonders, official mod support (with Steam Workshop!), and much more.

Check the details:
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1062090/view/4617965876718311948

🌳 Get the game here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1062090/Timberborn/
https://www.gog.com/game/timberborn
https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/timberborn
https://humblebundle.com/store/timberborn

-- About Timberborn --
Humans are long gone. In a world struck by droughts and toxic waste, will your lumberpunk beavers do any better? Timberborn is a city-building game featuring ingenious animals, vertical architecture, water physics, and terraforming. The game is available in English, Polish, Ukrainian, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, German, French, Russian, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, and Japanese. For a localized description, check the store pages linked above.

-- Features --
🦫 Two unique beaver factions
💦 Droughts and waves of toxic waste
🧨 3D water physics with dams and floodgates
⛰️ Fully terra-formable maps
🏡 Vertical settlements  
🪓 Lumberpunk machinery and bots
🌇 Day and night cycle
🥕 Well-being mechanics
🗾 Map editor and mods

-- Find us on: --
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1062090/Timberborn
https://discord.gg/timberborn
https://twitter.com/Timberborn
https://www.facebook.com/TimberbornGame
https://www.tiktok.com/@timberborn_official
https://www.instagram.com/timberborn_official
